text: Mubarak Mohammed al-Otaibi (born 8 January 1986, Riyadh), known as Mubarak Mohammed A Alotaibi, Waqqas al-Jazrawi and Abu Gayth, is a Saudi Arabian man who serves as the Syria-based deputy leader for Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant operations inside Saudi Arabia. ==History== He was designated a 'Specially Designated Global Terrorist' on 27 April 2017 by the US State Department. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant members Category:Living people Category:Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant in Saudi Arabia
title: Mubarak Mohammed al-Otaibi
